subject: Figure Skating
Olympic Games
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: After a disappointing 2006, Johnny Weir, the three-time defending men’s figure skating champion, has a new coach, a shorter haircut, a more focused approach, and an improved quadruple toe loop.
snippet: After a disappointing 2006, Johnny Weir, the three-time defending men’s figure skating champion, has a new coach, a shorter haircut, a more focused approach, and an improved quadruple toe loop.
